title: Eames Style ES104 Lobby Chair Red
body: Originally designed in 1960 for the Rockefeller Center in New York by Charles Eames. Eames ES104 Lobby Chair stands out amongst the three Lobby Chairs design because of one unique quality: Outstanding comfort. The inviting ES104 offers supreme comfort with their luxuriously padded leather cushions. A very stunning design and exceptional comfort in one timeless piece.
